#### What we provide with each VPS

* Semi Managed: Our techs will help you with managing your VM.
* DDoS Protection: We offer free 50 Gbps DDoS protection with our USA plans.
* 30 Minutes Support: We usually reply to tickets within 30 minutes.
* Instant Deploy: Just order and get the VM running in seconds.
* Clean IPv4: All of the IPs provided with our service is clean and isn't listed anywhere.
* Extra IPv4: We offer extra IPv4 addresses for £1.00 per IP, up to 5 IP addresses per VM.
* rDNS: We will change the reverse DNS for your IP to whatever you like for free.
* Extra Mile!: We will go the extra mile to assist you, always!
* Love: We love our customers, hugs and kisses can be requested via live chat.
